newsitem.title: FINLAND: ILKKA SAYS HAS 9.52 PCT OF K-P KIRJAPAINO.
newsitem.headline: ILKKA SAYS HAS 9.52 PCT OF K-P KIRJAPAINO.

text.p: Finnish publisher Ilkka Oy said in a statement on Monday it had bought 6.42 percent of shares in Keski-Pohjanmaan Kirjapaino Oy, upping its stake to 9.52 percent of shares and 13.45 percent of votes.
